mapper.sql: b.bid, b.oid, b.corporate_id, b.total, b.detail, b.remark, b.ctime
mapper.select: select , c.`name` corporateName from pro_bidder b left join corporate c on b.corporate_id = c.cid where b.bid = #{bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select , c.`name` corporateName from pro_bidder b left join corporate c on b.corporate_id = c.cid where b.oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into pro_bidder (bid, oid, corporate_id, total, detail, remark) values (#{bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into pro_bidder
bid,
oid,
corporate_id,
total,
detail,
remark,

mapper.update:
update pro_bidder
corporate_id = #{corporateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where bid = #{bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
